title: Hummus with Ranchitas Naturales
ingredients: 1 can of chickpeas (15 oz – 250 g), drained
instructions: Step 1. In a food processor, combine the lemon juice, tahini, garlic, olive oil, and cumin. Process until smooth.
Step 2. Add half of the chickpeas and the water, then process again.
Step 3. Add the remaining chickpeas and process until creamy.
Step 4. Sprinkle paprika on top and serve with Ranchitas Naturales.
description: Creamy homemade hummus that pairs perfectly with the crunch of Ranchitas Naturales. A healthy and delicious option.
